privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.effectiveDate: Effective date: February 4, 2026 — Last updated: February 4, 2026
privacy.intro: AstroDating ("we", "us", "our") operates the AstroDating mobile application (the "App"). This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect, how we use it, who we share it with, and what rights you have regarding your data. By creating an account you agree to the practices described below.
privacy.s1_1_ex1: Name, email address, password, social-login tokens (Google, Apple, Facebook)
privacy.s1_1_ex2: Photos (up to 6), bio, age, gender, occupation, interests, relationship intentions
privacy.s1_1_ex3: Date of birth, time of birth, birth city, birth coordinates, sun / moon / rising signs, full natal chart
privacy.s1_1_ex4: Age range, maximum distance, gender preference, zodiac-sign filters, element filters, compatibility threshold
privacy.s1_1_ex5: Text messages exchanged with other users
privacy.s1_1_ex6: Any content you send when contacting our support team
privacy.s1_2_ex1: Device model, operating system, unique device identifiers, IP address, app version
privacy.s1_2_ex2: City, latitude, and longitude (used to show approximate distance to other users; exact coordinates are never shown to others)
privacy.s1_2_ex3: Swipe actions (like, super-like, pass), matches, feature usage, last-active timestamp, onboarding completion status
privacy.s1_2_ex4: Error stack traces, session data, and performance metrics collected via Sentry (disabled in development builds)
privacy.s1_2_ex5: Expo push token and device type, used solely to deliver notifications you have opted into
privacy.s1_3_social: Social-login providers — When you sign in with Google, Apple, or Facebook we receive your name and email address (and, if available, profile photo) as permitted by the provider.
privacy.s1_3_geo: Geocoding — We use OpenStreetMap / Nominatim to convert city names into coordinates. No personal identifiers are sent in these requests.
privacy.s2_provide: Provide the service — Create your account, display your profile, calculate your birth chart, compute compatibility scores, enable matching and messaging.
privacy.s2_personalize: Personalization — Show you profiles that match your discovery preferences and astrological compatibility.
privacy.s2_safety: Safety & integrity — Detect and prevent fraud, enforce our Terms of Service, and process user-block and report actions.
privacy.s2_comm: Communication — Send push notifications for new matches, messages, and important service updates.
privacy.s2_subs: Subscriptions — Process and manage premium subscriptions and in-app purchases through RevenueCat; track feature entitlements and trial usage.
privacy.s2_improve: Improvement & analytics — Understand usage patterns, diagnose crashes (via Sentry), and improve the App.
privacy.s2_legal: Legal compliance — Respond to lawful requests from authorities and enforce our legal rights.
privacy.s3_intro: Some information you provide may be considered sensitive under applicable law, including:
privacy.s3_item1: Date and time of birth, birth location (astrology data)
privacy.s3_note: This data is provided voluntarily and is used only to deliver the core features of the App (birth-chart calculation, compatibility matching, distance-based discovery). We do not sell sensitive data or use it for advertising.
privacy.s4_1_text: Your profile information (name, age, photos, bio, occupation, interests, zodiac signs, compatibility score) is visible to other users during discovery and after matching. Your exact location is never displayed; only an approximate distance is shown. Message content is visible only to you and the recipient.
privacy.s4_2_note: Each provider processes data only on our behalf and under contractual obligations to protect it.
privacy.s4_3_text: We may disclose your data if required by law, regulation, legal process, or governmental request, or to protect the rights, safety, or property of AstroDating, our users, or the public.
privacy.s4_4_text: If AstroDating is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your personal data may be transferred as part of that transaction. We will notify you of any such change.
privacy.s5_active: Active accounts — We retain your data for as long as your account is active and as needed to provide the service.
privacy.s5_deleted: Deleted accounts — When you delete your account, we delete or anonymize your personal data within 30 days, except where retention is required by law or necessary to resolve disputes.
privacy.s5_messages: Messages — Messages are deleted when both participants have deleted their accounts or the match is removed.
privacy.s5_crash: Crash reports — Sentry data is retained for up to 90 days.
privacy.s5_legal: Legal holds — Data may be retained longer if needed for ongoing legal proceedings or regulatory obligations.
privacy.s6_intro: We implement industry-standard measures to protect your data, including:
privacy.s6_tls: Encryption in transit (TLS/HTTPS for all API communication)
privacy.s6_rest: Encryption at rest for stored data (Supabase-managed encryption)
privacy.s6_rls: Row-level security policies in the database to prevent unauthorized access
privacy.s6_hash: Password hashing (handled by Supabase Auth; we never store plaintext passwords)
privacy.s6_note: No system is completely secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.s7_intro: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights:
privacy.s7_access: Access — Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
privacy.s7_correction: Correction — Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
privacy.s7_deletion: Deletion — Request deletion of your personal data.
privacy.s7_portability: Portability — Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
privacy.s7_objection: Objection / Restriction — Object to or request restriction of certain processing activities.
privacy.s7_withdraw: Withdraw consent — Where processing is based on consent, you may withdraw it at any time without affecting the lawfulness of prior processing.
privacy.s7_ctrl1: Edit or delete your profile information at any time from the Profile tab.
privacy.s7_ctrl2: Adjust discovery preferences (age, distance, zodiac filters) from Settings.
privacy.s7_ctrl3: Block any user to prevent further interaction.
privacy.s7_ctrl4: Delete your account from the Settings screen, which triggers removal of your data.
privacy.s7_ctrl5: Manage push-notification permissions through your device settings.
privacy.s7_ccpa_intro: If you are a California resident, you have additional rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act, including:
privacy.s7_ccpa1: The right to know what personal information we collect and how it is used.
privacy.s7_ccpa2: The right to request deletion of your personal information.
privacy.s7_ccpa3: The right to opt out of the "sale" or "sharing" of personal information. We do not sell your personal data.
privacy.s7_ccpa4: The right to non-discrimination for exercising your privacy rights.
privacy.s7_gdpr_intro: If you are in the European Economic Area or the United Kingdom, our legal bases for processing are:
privacy.s7_gdpr1: Contractual necessity — Processing needed to provide the service you signed up for (account management, matching, messaging).
privacy.s7_gdpr2: Consent — For optional features such as push notifications and processing of sensitive data (birth information, location).
privacy.s7_gdpr3: Legitimate interests — Safety, fraud prevention, service improvement, and crash reporting.
privacy.s7_gdpr4: Legal obligation — Compliance with applicable laws.
privacy.s7_gdpr_note: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data-protection authority.
privacy.s8_text: Your data may be processed in countries other than your own. Where required, we rely on Standard Contractual Clauses or other legally approved transfer mechanisms to ensure an adequate level of protection.
privacy.s9_text: AstroDating is intended for users aged 18 and older. We do not knowingly collect personal data from anyone under 18. If we become aware that a user is under 18, we will promptly delete their account and associated data. If you believe a minor has created an account, please contact us immediately.
privacy.s10_text: The App may contain links to third-party websites or services. This Privacy Policy does not apply to those services, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies independently.
privacy.s11_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we make material changes, we will notify you through the App or by email before the changes take effect. The "Last updated" date at the top of this page indicates when the policy was most recently revised. Continued use of the App after the effective date constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy.s12_text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your data rights, contact us at:
privacy.s12_response: We aim to respond to all requests within 30 days.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AstroDating.
help.stillNeedHelpDesc: Can't find what you're looking for? Reach out to our support team.
help.q_createAccount: How do I create an account?
help.a_createAccount: Download AstroDating from the App Store or Google Play, then sign up with your email, Google, Apple, or Facebook account. You'll need to enter your birth date, time, and location to generate your natal chart.
help.q_changeBirthTime: Can I change my birth time after signing up?
help.a_changeBirthTime: Yes. Go to Profile > Edit Profile > Birth Details. Note that changing your birth time will recalculate your entire natal chart and may change your compatibility scores with other users.
help.q_deleteAccount: How do I delete my account?
help.a_deleteAccount: You can delete your account from Settings > Account > Delete Account in the app, or visit astrodatingapp.com/account/delete. Your data will be permanently removed within 30 days.
help.a_compatibility: We use real synastry — the astrological practice of comparing two birth charts. We analyze aspects between your planets and theirs (conjunctions, trines, squares, etc.) across key relationship houses to generate an overall compatibility score.
help.q_fewMatches: Why don't I see many matches?
help.a_fewMatches: Try expanding your discovery preferences: increase the distance range, widen the age range, or lower the minimum compatibility threshold. You can also remove specific zodiac sign or element filters.
help.a_superLike: A super like tells someone you're especially interested. They'll see a star icon on your profile. Free users get 1 super like per day, Celestial users get 5, and Cosmic users get unlimited.
help.q_manageSub: How do I manage my subscription?
help.a_manageSub: Subscriptions are managed through the App Store (iOS) or Google Play (Android). Go to your device's subscription settings to upgrade, downgrade, or cancel.
help.a_refund: Refunds are handled by Apple or Google according to their respective policies. Contact their support for refund requests. AstroDating cannot process refunds directly.
help.a_autoRenew: Yes. Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can cancel at any time from your device's subscription settings.
help.q_report: How do I report a user?
help.a_report: Tap the three-dot menu on any profile or in a chat conversation, then select 'Report'. Choose a reason and add details. Our team reviews all reports within 24 hours.
help.a_block: Tap the three-dot menu on their profile or in your chat, then select 'Block'. They won't be able to see your profile or contact you, and they won't be notified.
help.q_locationShared: Is my location shared with other users?
help.a_locationShared: Only your approximate distance is shown (e.g., '3 miles away'). Your exact coordinates are never visible to other users.
help.q_birthTime: Do I need to know my exact birth time?
help.a_birthTime: For the most accurate chart, yes. Your birth time determines your rising sign (ascendant) and house placements, which significantly affect compatibility scores. If you don't know your exact time, you can enter an approximate time or select 'Unknown' — but your chart and scores will be less precise.
help.q_sunVsFull: What's the difference between sun sign and full chart compatibility?
help.a_sunVsFull: Sun sign compatibility only considers one planet. Full chart compatibility (synastry) analyzes all planetary placements, aspects, and house overlays between two charts — giving a much more nuanced and accurate picture of relationship dynamics.
help.a_personalizedHoroscopes: Yes. Unlike generic horoscopes based only on your sun sign, our horoscopes are calculated from your full natal chart, including transits to your moon, rising, Venus, and other key placements.

accountDelete.title: Account Deletion
accountDelete.subtitle: This will permanently delete your AstroDating account and all associated data including your profile, matches, and messages.
accountDelete.step1Desc: Enter the email address associated with your AstroDating account. We'll send you a verification code.
accountDelete.step2Desc: We sent a 6-digit code to {email}. Enter it below to confirm account deletion.
accountDelete.warning: This action is permanent. Your account, profile, matches, messages, and all associated data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
accountDelete.doneDesc: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.
accountDelete.doneNote: We're sorry to see you go. If you change your mind, you can always create a new account.
